page.title: 06Local industries, Annan
page.content: The Annan and Newbie areas have a number of fairly large{industrial sites. 1. Scottish Seafoods (Youngs) have a {fish processing}factory in Port Street, Annan, employing mainly women. 2. The Diversey Company in Port Street is a{chemical production company manufacturing, packaging and distributing detergents, weed-killers, sheep dips, etc. 3. Cochrans at Newbie manufacture {very large boilers}and export all over the world. 4. Glaxo at Newbie is a very modern {drug-making}factory, highly computerised . 5. Imperial Chemical Industries at Newbie make{explosives,}mainly for the Armed Forces.
